channel.title: Client help?
channel.description:
Well, I was never having problems with my clients until randomly today I did. I'm pretty sure I need to download java again or something but I can't find it. The message I get is "'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . ."
If it is Java could you give me a link. Be very detailed even if it is obvious. All help is appreciated.
EDIT: "Error occurred during initialization of VM java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object Press any key to continue . . ."
I now get that message. Please help.

item.title: Client help?
item.dc:creator: @pk_bush pk bush
item.description:
@pk_bush wrote:

I already have searched. Couldn’t find anything. If you know could you please give me a link?

Read full topic

item.title: Client help?
item.dc:creator: @pk_bush pk bush
item.description:
@pk_bush wrote:

Well, I was never having problems with my clients until randomly today I did. I’m pretty sure I need to download java again or something but I can’t find it. The message I get is “‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .”

If it is Java could you give me a link. Be very detailed even if it is obvious. All help is appreciated.

EDIT:
“Error occurred during initialization of VM
java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object
Press any key to continue . . .”

I now get that message. Please help.

Read full topic
